heading: Friday
text: Showers increasing from west to east, more so in the north.

heading: Saturday
text: Chance of sprinkles or mountain flurries.
temperature: Valleys mid 40s to mid 50s, north to south

heading: Sunday
text: Rising chance of rain or mountain snow showers north, mainly after noon.
temperature: Valleys mid 40s to around 50, except low to mid 50s southeast
